body_html: @summersunshine1 I'm wondering what is the side effect of running this hook especially when you resume the training ? The expected behaviour is to restore the latest checkpoint in the model dir when you resume the training and only warm start with a given checkpoint at the beginning of the training step.
body_text: @summersunshine1 I'm wondering what is the side effect of running this hook especially when you resume the training ? The expected behaviour is to restore the latest checkpoint in the model dir when you resume the training and only warm start with a given checkpoint at the beginning of the training step.
body: @summersunshine1 I'm wondering what is the side effect of running this hook especially when you resume the training ? The expected behaviour is to restore the latest checkpoint in the model dir when you resume the training and only warm start with a given checkpoint at the beginning of the training step.
